bwwExcerpt: It is through Eddie and Jess that the two stories in "Cost of Living" ultimately intersect, at a very low point for both. "It's just unfortunate that some people have already lived a lot of life before they meet other people," she tells him. Yet part of the beauty of "Cost of Living" is something else these disparate characters share: a determination to press on - no matter the price.
